title: He Keeps Sneaking Women In My House
itunes:title: He Keeps Sneaking Women In My House
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I'm a 44 year old mother and I allowed my 24 year old son to move back home after college. I had hoped that he would find a great job and get his own place, but he wasn’t so lucky, so I told him he could come home temporarily. My house rules are the same as when he was in high school. He’s expected to keep the house clean and the lawn looking good, in exchange for housing. Our bedrooms are on opposite sides of my condo so I rarely see him because of our work schedules and his social life...............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I'm a 44 year old mother and I allowed my 24 year old son to move back home after college. I had hoped that he would find a great job and get his own place, but he wasn’t so lucky, so I told him he could come home temporarily. My house rules are the same as when he was in high school. He’s expected to keep the house clean and the lawn looking good, in exchange for housing. Our bedrooms are on opposite sides of my condo so I rarely see him because of our work schedules and his social life...............
